description: After an apple pie recipe with a twist? Give these blackberry jam and apple pie bites a try and enjoy flashbacks to eating these treats as a kid.
keywords: Apple pie & tart,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Apple,Tree nut free,Egg free,Jun 2021,Sesame free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Apple Pie Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 sheets frozen shortcrust pastry, partially thawed
385g can Woolworths apple slices pie fruit, drained, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C/180°C fanforced. Line 2 large baking trays with baking paper. Cut each pastry sheet into 6 even rectangles.
Combine apple, jam, cornflour and cinnamon in a medium bowl. Spoon 1 1/2 tbs of apple mixture over half of the pastry rectangles, leaving a 1cm border on all sides.
Top apple mixture with remaining pastry rectangles. Press edges with a fork to seal. Place tarts on trays. Refrigerate for 10 minutes to chill.
Bake for 25 minutes or until pastry is golden and cooked through. Stand on trays for 2 minutes, then transfer to a wire rack to cool.

Meanwhile, to make the icing, place icing sugar and vanilla in a bowl. Gradually stir in 2 tbs water to make a thin icing. Spoon icing over tarts and scatter over sprinkles. Stand for 20 minutes or until set. Serve.
